Accept Decline MOST POPULAR IN INDIA SPORTS FANTASY PLATFORM I accept Privacy Policy PLAY NOW 4.1 ✭✭✭✭✩ APP RATINGS 1 Million DOWNLOADS 1K+ Daily CONTESTS APPLICATION TYPE RUN MANIA FANTASY SPORTS FAQ How do I create a team on Run Mania? To create a team on Run Mania, simply download the app, sign up/login, and select the current match you want to create your team for. Then, choose your playing XI by selecting players from the squad provided. How do I earn points on Run Mania? You can earn points on Run Mania based on the performance of the players in your team during the match. Points are awarded for runs scored, wickets taken, catches, run-outs, and more. Can I change my team after the match has started? No, once the match has started, you cannot make any changes to your team on Run Mania. It is important to finalize your playing XI before the match begins. How do I join a contest on Run Mania? To join a contest on Run Mania, go to the contests section in the app, choose a contest you want to participate in, and pay the entry fee. Once you have selected your team, you will be automatically entered into the contest. Is Run Mania available on both iOS and Android? Yes, Run Mania is available for download on both iOS and Android devices. How can I withdraw my winnings on Run Mania? You can withdraw your winnings on Run Mania by going to the wallet section in the app, entering the amount you wish to withdraw, and selecting your preferred payment How can I contact customer support on Run Mania? If you have any questions or concerns, you can contact customer support on Run Mania by emailing or by using the in-app chat feature for real-time assistance. pages.policy: Run Mania | Protecting Your Personal Information: Run Mania Privacy Policy Run Mania Terms & Conditions PRIVACY POLICY Privacy Policy At Run Mania, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and share your information when you use our cricket fantasy app. Information We Collect: When you create an account on Run Mania, we collect your name, email address, and password. We may collect information about your device, such as device type, operating system, and IP address. When you participate in fantasy cricket contests, we collect information about your team selections, contest entries, and performance. We may collect information about your interactions with our app, such as clicks, swipes, and time spent on certain features. How We Use Your Information: We use your information to create and manage your account, process transactions, and provide customer support. We use your information to personalize your experience on Run Mania, such as recommending contests and players based on your preferences. We may use your information to send you promotional emails and notifications about new contests and features. We may use your information for data analysis and research to improve our app and services. Information Sharing: We may share your information with third-party service providers who help us with app development, hosting, and customer support. We may share your information in response to a legal request, such as a court order or subpoena. We may share your information with our affiliates and partners for marketing purposes, but only with your consent. Data Security: We take measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, misuse, and disclosure. We use encryption, firewalls, and other security measures to safeguard your data. We regularly review and update our security practices to ensure they meet industry standards. Changes to Privacy Policy: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our app, services, or legal requirements. We will notify you of any significant changes and seek your consent if required by law. Contact Us: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at RunMania@gmail.com By using Run Mania, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy. Thank you for trusting us with your personal information. Copyright @2023
pages.terms: Run Mania | Welcome to Run Mania: Your Ultimate Fantasy Cricket Experience - Terms and Conditions Run Mania Terms & Conditions PRIVACY POLICY Terms and conditions Welcome to Run Mania, the ultimate fantasy cricket app where you can put your knowledge of the game to the test and compete against other cricket fans from around the world. Before you start using our app, please make sure to read and understand the following terms and conditions: By downloading and using Run Mania, you agree to abide by these terms and conditions and any other policies or guidelines provided by the app. Run Mania is intended for users who are 18 years of age or older. If you are under 18, you must have permission from a parent or guardian to use the app. Run Mania is a fantasy cricket app where users can create their own teams by selecting real-life players and earn points based on their performance in actual cricket matches. Users can participate in various contests and leagues on the app by joining or creating teams and competing against other users. Users can earn virtual currency and rewards by participating in contests, winning leagues, and completing various in-app tasks. Users can also purchase virtual currency and other in-app items using real money to enhance their gaming experience. Run Mania reserves the right to modify, suspend, or terminate any contest or feature on the app at any time without prior notice. Users are responsible for ensuring that the information they provide on the app, including their team selections and contest entries, is accurate and up-to-date. Users are strictly prohibited from cheating, hacking, or using any unauthorized means to manipulate the app or gain an unfair advantage over other users. Run Mania takes user privacy and security seriously. We use industry-standard measures to protect user data and information. However, we cannot guarantee the security of user data in all circumstances. Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account login information and are advised not to share it with anyone else. Run Mania may use cookies and other tracking technologies to improve the user experience and provide personalized content and advertisements. Users may be required to provide proof of identity or other documentation to verify their account or participate in certain contests. Run Mania may collect and use user data for various purposes, including but not limited to improving the app, analyzing user behavior, and providing targeted advertisements. Users can contact Run Mania's customer support team for any issues, complaints, or feedback related to the app. Users can report any violations of these terms and conditions or suspicious activities on the app to Run Mania's support team for investigation. Run Mania is not responsible for any losses or damages incurred by users as a result of using the app, including but not limited to financial losses, data breaches, or system failures. Users are solely responsible for complying with all applicable laws and regulations while using the app, including but not limited to tax laws, gambling regulations, and intellectual property laws. Run Mania may update these terms and conditions from time to time. Users will be notified of any changes, and continued use of the app after the updates will constitute acceptance of the new terms. These terms and conditions constitute the entire agreement between users and Run Mania regarding the use of the app and supersede any prior agreements or understandings. By using Run Mania, you agree to all of the above terms and conditions. Thank you for choosing Run Mania for your fantasy cricket experience. Good luck and happy gaming! Copyright @2023
